title: Enhancing Practical Machine Learning Competencies: Understanding Observational Learning Psychological Mechanisms in Online Retail Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic psychological theories and understanding of consumer behavior
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: The impact of psychological distance on observational learning methods can be analyzed through experimental design
The consumer decision-making process can be mathematically modeled using product popularity and appeal range information
Differences in observational learning under proximal/distal psychological distance conditions can be visualized through data visualization
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
